intro: This document provides a comprehensive description of the products delivered by the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS) within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It details the specifications, formats, attribute tables, and metadata associated with the EGMS Basic, Calibrated, and Ortho products. The document focuses on the technical aspects of these InSAR-derived ground motion products, including their processing methodologies, spatial and temporal resolutions, coordinate reference systems, and data access mechanisms, enabling users to effectively utilise the service.
